item.title: Passwords and quests
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

The passwords on your ShitScape I mean DeltaScape source are encrypted in Md5 and Salt unknown to me. I’m positive it can be found but good-luck. Your quests are simple ints. Find your initialize, in your Client class. I’m not going to use spoon-feeding terms because you want the passwords to steal RS accounts or another P-server’s. Anyway, go to where your player is first initialized and find where it says if starter == 0, ect. Below that add something like this.

q1 = 14;

That’s saying that quest 1 is on stage fourteen because Delta (Steven) is a retard even though he was better at 12 than half the people on google. He never bothered to put much effort into things. He should have had a quest handler. Also he should have made a scratch timer like me that can actually be accurate, and doesn’t lag the server because it’s not being called OVER AND OVER AND OVER again every few seconds. In short; ignore my Delta rant and learn from what little I showed you because you are going to use it for EVIL. lol.

EDIT: There is nothing wrong with ints for quests at all. I just hate the way Delta did everything.

Read full topic
